original_text: But the group of true believers remains strong, like the foundation under a building. God has written his message there. It says, ‘The Lord knows who his own people are.’ It also says, ‘Everyone who says that he belongs to the Lord must stop doing bad things.’
korean_text: 그러나 하나님의 견고한 터는 섰으니 인침이 있어 일렀으되 주께서 자기 백성을 아신다 하며 또 주의 이름을 부르는 자마다 불의에서 떠날지어다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But the group of true believers remains strong
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 참된 믿음을 가진 사람들의 무리는 강하게 남아 있습니다

sentences.original_text: like the foundation under a building
God has written his message there
It says, 'The Lord knows who his own people are'
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 '주님은 자기 백성이 누구인지 아신다'고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: It also says, 'Everyone who says that he belongs to the Lord'
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 '자신이 주님께 속한다고 말하는 모든 사람은'
